items.lamp: On the table there is a lamp.
items.food: On the table lies plate with food.

house hall.name: house hall
house hall.description: You are inside a building, a well house for a large spring. On the left there is huge door. In front of you there is open window.

start room.name: forest
start room.description: You are in a forest at the end of the road. There is a larger house in front of you. On the other side there are hills.

hill.name: hill
hill.description: You are at the mountain. There is crossroads. One way right, second left.

items.box: There is a closed box on the ground.

chamber.name: chamber
chamber.description: You are in an old chamber.

dead end.name: dead end
dead end.description: You are at the end of the road. It was a long walk. You are hungry. There is nothing here.

items.dragon: Look! It's an enormous dragon! It looks scary.
